GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. I used toplay the guitar when I was younger.
2. Did you useto travel a lot in your last job?
3. We usedto eat potatoes every day.
4. I used to doa lot of sport at school.
5. Did youuse to help your parents at home?
6. I didn'tuse to like John but now I think he's OK.
7. A: Did you use to live here? B: Yes, I did.
8. We did n'tuse to watch TV when I was young.
